settings.title: The JETS Story
settings.text:
JETS is for women who want more. For those who live their life with a jetset mindset, and only settle for the best.

For the last 20 years, we have pioneered design-led innovation in swim and resort wear, creating timeless warm weather collections that embody a unique sense of glamorous sophistication.

Our signature silhouettes are crafted using high-quality fabrications with unrivalled attention to detail, producing products you can trust - wherever you’re heading next.

settings.title: The Perfect Fit
settings.text: Our JETS design team work tirelessly to develop silhouettes that not only enhance and flatter a woman’s figure but withstand the test of time. Our Sydney based design team create sketches that are brought to life through in-house seamstresses, who then resample and refit until they reach the highest levels of comfort and support. Our pieces are then crafted with highest quality European fabrics and unique seasonal prints.

settings.title: Considered Design
settings.text:
Innovations that support the natural environment are a key focus for JETS.

JETS Australia is renowned for fabric innovation, sourcing the highest quality materials from European fabric mills at the forefront of swim technology. JETS continue their journey to greater sustainability through utilising fabrics and processes that support the protection of our fragile environment. They use fabrics crafted from 100% regenerated Nylon yarn created from discarded fishing nets and other waste materials, as well as digitally printed textiles that ensure less environmental waste. Timeless designs and quality fabrications ensure JETS pieces will remain in your wardrobe for years to come and not end up in landfill.
